original_text: He chose you as his special people because he loved your ancestors. You are their descendants so he rescued you out of Egypt. He himself showed you his great power.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 조상들을 사랑하신 고로 그 후손인 너를 택하시고 큰 권능으로 친히 인도하여 애굽에서 나오게 하시며

sentences.original_text: He chose you as his special people
so he rescued you out of Egypt
He himself showed you his great power
sentences.korean_translation: 그분 자신이 당신에게 그분의 위대한 능력을 보여주셨습니다
